document.full_text: human rights watch said on monday ugandan security forces shot dead at least nine unarmed people -- including three in the back as they fled -- during protests against soaring inflation, and called for an independent probe.
document.title: hrw calls for probe over uganda food protest deaths
lines_and_colors: human rights watch said on monday ugandan security forces shot dead at least nine unarmed people -- including three in the back as they fled -- during protests against soaring inflation, and called for an independent probe.
